extraDescription: Microsoft Dynamics Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Specialist required to support the existing Organizational Relationship Business Intelligence Integration Tool (ORBIT) Proof-of-Concept (POC) Solution developed on the CRM platform. The specialist will provide advice and recommendation on features that should be activated or removed from the out-of-the-box CRM. This includes implementing a security model for the ORBIIT users, the creation of a new dashboard, the implementation of employee reporting capabilities for escalation process, fixing issues and finally the implementation of business rules in the POC.
